profile:
At Reliance Mackenzie, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.

Reliance Mackenzie™ is Regina’s choice for furnace repair, HVAC, air conditioners, water heaters and plumbing services, with a history of working in Saskatchewan’s capital city and servicing the surrounding area since Doug Mackenzie founded Mackenzie Plumbing & Heating in 1985.

As your local team of plumbing and heating specialists, we understand your unique needs here in Regina and we’re always ready to offer you knowledgeable advice and the support you need to stay comfortable at home, at work and in your community.

Looking for a new furnace, air conditioner or water heater? Is your old equipment in need of service, cleaning or repair? Reliance Mackenzie offers competitive prices on heating and cooling equipment and water heaters, plus expert customer service and great customer reviews.

Whether you need emergency assistance or regular maintenance, our experts in furnace repair, plumbing, hot water tanks, tankless water heaters, air conditioning or air conditioners are here to help!

We’re proud of being known for our integrity and quality, due to over 50 years of experience of providing quality heating and air conditioning solutions for our customers.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!
